label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_007
content:
## 2024-04-15 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 105
- Active: 103
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 12
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 2

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 25
- Mid Dose: 25
- High Dose: 27
- Placebo: 28

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 48.5
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 16.4
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 62.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 109.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 68.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 21.1
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 73.5
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 29.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 115.2
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 165.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 125.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 28.7
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 100.6
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 42.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 147.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 235.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 162.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 41.4
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 6.8
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 5.1
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 14.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 25.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 16.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 5.5

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 50.9
- Erythema Percentage: 28.9
- Swelling Percentage: 9.9
- Induration Percentage: 8.8
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 34.2

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 16.6
- Fatigue Percentage: 23.1
- Myalgia Percentage: 27.9
- Headache Percentage: 19.5
- Chills Percentage: 14.4

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K): Mean: 9.0
- WBC (K) SD: 1.5
- Lymphocyte Percentage: Mean: 39.9
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 7.8
- Neutrophil Percentage: Mean: 56.0
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 6.5
- Platelets (K): Mean: 237
- Platelets (K) SD: 43
- CRP (mg/L): Mean: 5.5
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL): Mean: 13.9
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 0.8

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-0771, Description: malaise, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0765, Description: injection site pain, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0749, Description: headache, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0701, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose

### Events
- Serum sample aliquoting completed for 20 subjects
- Cold chain temperature log reviewed: all within -70C +/- 5C

### Notes
- Week 7: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 105 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
